title: Does US monetary policy uncertainty affect returns of Asian Developed, emerging, and frontier equity markets? Empirical evidence by using the quantile-on-quantile approach
content:
Publication date: 30 June 2024

Source: Heliyon, Volume 10, Issue 12

Author(s): Rimsha Arshad, Hassan Zada, Kazi Sohag, Wing-Keung Wong, Ehsan Ullah, Hassan Raza
